verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Crucem tuam adoramus Domine
resurrectionem tuam laudamus Domine
Laudamus et glorificamus
Resurrectionem tuam laudamus Domine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O Lord Your cross we adore and glorify
For Your holy ressurection we praise You Lord of life
We praise You and we glorify You
For Your holy resurecction we praise You God of life.
